document_api_meta.title: Get Shop Video Performance Overview
document_api_meta.env_desc: Returns overall performance metrics for all videos under a shop.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: start_date_ge
request_query_param.desc:
Start date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone.
In the parameter name, "ge" refers to "greater than or equal to" (inclusive)

request_query_param.name: end_date_lt
request_query_param.desc:
End date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone.
In the parameter name, "lt" refers to "less than" (exclusive)

request_query_param.name: with_comparison
request_query_param.desc:
Whether previous period data is returned for comparison.
Available values: true, false
Default value: false
The previous period has the same length and granularity as the current period with end time being the same as the start time of the current period.
Example:
If start_time_ge = 2024-04-01 and end_time_lt = 2024-04-08, the previous period data will be from 2024-03-25 to 2024-04-01.

request_query_param.name: granularity
request_query_param.desc:
Granularity of the data.
Available values: ALL, 1D
Default value: ALL
* ALL: aggregate
* 1D: daily

request_query_param.name: currency
request_query_param.desc:
Currency.
Available values: USD, LOCAL
Default value: LOCAL
* USD: US dollars
* LOCAL: local currency where the shop is located

request_query_param.name: account_type
request_query_param.desc:
Types of the accounts under which videos were created.
Available values: ALL, LINKED_ACCOUNTS, AFFILIATES
Default value: ALL
* ALL: all account types
* LINKED_ACCOUNTS: linked account types, includes official and marketing account types
* AFFILIATES: affiliate account type

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^performance
response_param.desc: Overall performance data for videos.

response_param.name: ^^intervals
response_param.desc: Interval data for the requested time range. The time range of each interval is determined by the granularity.

response_param.name: ^^^start_date
response_param.desc: Start date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, inclusive.

response_param.name: ^^^end_date
response_param.desc: End date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, exclusive.

response_param.name: ^^^gmv
response_param.desc: Overall Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) for videos.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: GMV amount in the corresponding currency.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP).

response_param.name: ^^^click_through_rate
response_param.desc:
Ratio of the number of product clicks compared to number of video views in raw decimal format. To calculate the percentage, multiple it by 100%.
Example: 0.0528 <=> 5.28%

response_param.name: ^^^sku_orders
response_param.desc: The total number of paid SKU orders placed directly from all shoppable videos.

response_param.name: ^^^units_sold
response_param.desc: Number of units sold from videos.

response_param.name: ^^comparison_intervals
response_param.desc:
Same structure as "intervals"
It contains data for the previous time range with the same range length and granularity of the current time range
Example, if current time range (represented in start_time_ge and end_time_lt) is from 2024-09-01 to 2024-09-08) with granularity "ALL", the previous_intervals will contain data from 2024-08-25 to 2024-09-01 with granularity "ALL"

response_param.name: ^^^start_date
response_param.desc: Start date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, inclusive.

response_param.name: ^^^end_date
response_param.desc: End date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, exclusive.

response_param.name: ^^^gmv
response_param.desc: Overall Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) for videos.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: GMV amount in the corresponding currency.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP).

response_param.name: ^^^click_through_rate
response_param.desc:
Ratio of the number of product clicks compared to number of video views in raw decimal format. To calculate the percentage, multiple it by 100%.
Example: 0.0528 <=> 5.28%

response_param.name: ^^^sku_orders
response_param.desc: The total number of paid SKU orders placed directly from all shoppable videos.

response_param.name: ^^^units_sold
response_param.desc: Number of units sold from videos.

response_param.name: ^latest_available_date
response_param.desc: Latest date in local timezone where data is ready (ISO 8601 format).

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access TikTok shop analytics such as live and video, GMV, orders and content traffic data such as CTR, visitors for a shop and products in shop.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your prior and go-forward TikTok Shop sales and traffic data by Shop and product, including but not limited to GMV, Number of orders, units sold, Number of buyers, product listings, product impressions and page views, Number of visitors, and click through rate (CTR), all by content type (video, live and product card).
